maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Canonical NPC
Welcome to Rookie Harbor!
Hey!\. It's nice here in the shade, isn't it?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Вітаю!\. Хороші тут у тіні, чи не так?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Your friend's still not here. What's the holdup?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Твій друг ще тут. У чому проблема?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I dunno... he said he'd arrive around this time.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Не знаю... він сказав, що прийде о цій годині.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Maybe he's stuck in Rhombus Square, watching the city from afar... you know how it is...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Може, він застряг на Площі Ромба, милуючись містом здалеку... ти знаєш, як це буває...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Yeah... Can't wait to finally enter that place, too!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ага... Не можу дочекатися, щоб нарешті теж увійти в це місце!

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ...Oh! Hey!
Is something the matter?
... Oh well... Ever notice how that tree has fruit?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ...Ох, гаразд... Ти помічала, що на цьому дереві є плоди?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I heard those are not instant matter but actual fruit!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Я чув, що це не уявна матерія, а справжні фрукти!

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Now I really wonder how they taste...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Тепер мені дуже цікаво, які вони на смак.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oh well... it's not like you can eat real-life fruit as an avatar.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ну та гаразд... все одно в образі аватара не можна їсти справжні фрукти.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: [nods]
Hey there.
...You seem kinda lost...
If you're waiting for somebody, this is the right spot.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Якщо ти чекаєш когось, то це найкраще місце.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Pretty much everyone here is waiting for new players arriving from Cross Central.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Майже всі чекають тут нових гравців, що прибувають з Cross Central.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: It's a popular meetup spot.
... You seem to be a new player, too. So you know what I mean, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: ...Ти, здається, також новий гравець. То що розумієш, про що я, так?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: [nods]
...You're a quiet one, I see.
They are late...
C'mon, relax. There is still time.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Та годі тобі, розслабся. Є ще час.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: The raid is scheduled in 10 minutes.
Nothing is planned. It's going to be a mess...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: А у нас навіть плану нема. Це буде повний бардак.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Don't be so serious about it. It's supposed to be fun, remember?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Не будь таким серйозним. Це має бути весело, пам'ятаєш?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: All that water... makes you want to jump right into it!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Стільки води... так і хочеться до неї стрибнути!

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Not sure I'd do that with your amount of armor.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: З твоєю кількістю броні я не ризикнув би цього робити.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Also, you'd just dissolve and respawn.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: До того ж ти просто розчинишся та відродишся тут.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Killjoy.
Mh... I swear there was an entrance here...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Мм... Я присягаюся, тут був прохід...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Hey!\. Over here!
Look at all these old style buildings!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Поглянь на всі ці будинки в старому стилі!

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: It's like we are in some kind of medieval fantasy world, non?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ми ніби у середньовічному фентезійному світі, чи не так?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: So...\. Right now I'm waiting here to meet a friend.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Загалом...\. Я тут чекаю на одного друга.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: But I haven't seen him so far.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Але я й досі його не бачу.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: There are just so many people here...
HOLERÖ!\.\.
Eeek!
Gyahahaha!
Sacrebleu!\. Was that really necessary?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Sacrebleu (Чорт!)\. Це справді було так необхідно?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Yes, very necessary.
I see you brought a friend?
Ah oui, that's Lea!\. I met her during the tutorial.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ах oui (Ах, так), це Лія! Я познайомилася з нею під час навчання.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Hi!
And this dark lord meanie here is \c[3]Lukas\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: А цей во, підлий темний лорд - \c[3]Лукас\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Also known as \c[3]Schneider\c[0].
Nice to meet you, Lea!
[nods]
So you finally reached the \c[3]Croissant\c[0].\. Having fun so far?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Нарешті ви дісталися до \c[3]Круасана\c[0].\. Весело було?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oui, énormément!
Wait...\. Croissant?
The mainland.\. You'll get the idea once you see the map.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Материк.\. Ти зрозумієш, як тільки глянеш на мапу.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Anyway, this is \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0].\. It's known for the incoming shipments of rookies like you.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text:
У будь-якому випадку, це \c[3]Гавань новачків\c[0].\.
Вона відома своїми новачками, що поступають сюди на зразок вас.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: It's also a fairly big place, which tends to be confusing for said rookies.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Це досить велике місце, в якому зазвичай тиняються згадані новачки.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: So I thought I'd give you a small tour!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Тому я подумав провести вам невеликий тур!

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Très bien!\. Lead the way!
\c[3]Schneider\c[0] is kind enough to show you around Rookie Harbor. Just follow him together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: \c[3]Шнайдер\c[0] виявив люб'язність провести вам екскурсію по Гавані новачків. Слідуйте за ним разом з \c[3]Емілі\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Ah, I see you now can open the golden chests.\. Congrats!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: О, бачу, що тепер ти можеш відкривати золоті скрині.\. Мої вітання!

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Lea!
Wondering about this chest, hm?
[nods]
Yeah, you can't open it yet.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Так, ти ще не можеш його відкрити.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: But you will be able to do it later in the game.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Але ти зможеш зробити це пізніше.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: You might want to add a \c[3]stamp\c[0] on your \c[3]map\c[0] to remember it.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Ти можеш додати \c[3]мітку\c[0] на \c[3]мапу\c[0], щоб запам'ятати його.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: In case you don't know what I mean, just have a closer look at the \c[3]map menu\c[0]!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Якщо не розумієш, про що я, просто вивчи \c[3]меню мапи\c[0]!

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oh, a present? For me?
[nods]
Thanks! I don't know why, but lately random people just give me stuff for free.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Дякую! Я не знаю чому, але останнім часом випадкові люди просто дають мені різні речі безкоштовно.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: I love it!
First, the \c[3]info building\c[0].
If you really want to dig into all the details of CrossWorlds, this is your place.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Якщо ви по-справжньому хочете вдатися у всі деталі CrossWorlds – вам сюди.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Combat arts, skills, all the stats from A to Z, you name it.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Техніки бою, навички, всі характеристики від А до Я все що завгодно.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Oh!\. That's the "Nerd Hub", right?
Ja, people call it that.
Frankly, it's a good thing to know about all that stuff.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Чесно кажучи, непогано було б знати всі ці речі.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: But it's not mandatory.
It's just a place to go back to whenever you're confused about something.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Це просто місце, куди можна звернутися, коли щось незрозуміло.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Let's move on!
By the way...\. "Emilienator"?\. Nice one.
I know!\. What's "Schneider" supposed to mean?
I'm a \c[3]Triblader\c[0].\. I cut things.
...\. What?
Not worth explaining.
Awww...
Oi, Lea!\. Why are you running away?
I promise, I'll make it short!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Я обіцяю, що це не триватиме багато часу!

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Shady Shorsh
Shady Shorsh
Hi!
Ahh!\. Y... you again?
[nods]
Okay... I guess that's the end of the line then.\. It's really a shame...
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Добре... Думаю, я приплив.\. Як шкода...

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: ...that you're so slow!!\.\. Byeeeee\..\..\..

And so the days went by with a game 
populated by both players and Evotars.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text:
І так минали дні у грі,
населеної як гравцями, і Еватарами.

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Finally, we set foot on the great continent of the croissant!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Нарешті ми ступаємо на великий континент Круассан!

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Entering \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0]!
To the right, you'll find the Info Hub.
A great place if...
Japp, that's such a nice tree to run around, isn't it?
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Japp (Йеп), це дерево добре підходить для кругової пробіжки, правда?

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Look, I get it.\. Who cares about the boring Info Hub!
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Слухайте, я зрозумів.\. Кому потрібен цей нудний інфоцентр!

maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.orig: Still, it's a place you might want to remember for later.\. Just saying.
maps/rookie-harbor/south.json/entities/1.text: Все ж таки, можливо, вам варто запам'ятати це місце.\. На всякий випадок.
